resources.string: Let\'s get your Skystream Media Center experience started
Could not write media player configuration files. Please, contact our support team.
An error has occurred while loading information from internet. Please, check your internet connection.
There was an error while decompressing the update file. Please, try again.
Internal error: something went wrong while communicating with download manager.
The requested destination file already exists.
Internal error: something went wrong when processing remote information.
This application is only for genuine EZ Stream devices. If you are using any other device this program will not work. To purchase a genuine EZ Stream unit please visit www.ezstreambox.com
No external storage device was found.
It seems that Play Store is not installed in your device. Please, install Google Apps.
%s is not installed. You must proceed to install it before continue.
"An HTTP code was received that download manager can't handle."
Failed to apply the new update to the media player. Please, contact our support team.
Update files are incomplete. Please, contact out support team for more information.
Failed to apply a clean update to the media player. Please, contact our support team.
Failed to mark the newly applied update as the last update. Please, contact our support team.

Disclaimer: By downloading or using this app you are agreeing that EZ Stream takes no responsibility for the content or addons included within. EZ Stream does not host, distribute, hold or have any control over any content provided by any addon. It is the users responsibility to ensure they are not selling, distributing or downloading any copyrighted material from any addons - please ensure the end user checks the legalities of this use within their country. EZ Stream does not provide any support on any add-ons within the Media Center application - EZ Stream is not affiliated with Media Center.
An internet connection has been established. Would you like to check for updates?
External Storage access is used to store update information. No other information will be accessed.
An internet connection is required to use this application
A new version of the Updater Application is available. Would you like to update now?
Installing the Media Center. Please wait…

Fresh Install – Clicking on Fresh Install WILL completely wipe any personalization you have added to Media Center. This includes Real Debrid accounts, Trakt accounts, favorites within Media Center, favorites within addons, additional addons that you have installed, and background images you have added. ONLY click on Fresh Install if you wish to completely wipe Media Center and end up with a clean installation. All personalization will need to be reinstalled by the end user.\n\nSave User Settings – Clicking on Save User Settings will update everything in Media Center the same way Fresh Install does, but will save most personalization that the end user has installed. Save User Settings will keep Real Debrid accounts, Trakt accounts, favorites within Media Center, favorites within addons, additional addons that you have installed, and background images you have added. This is the best option for users who had added personalization to their Media Center.
A new version of Media Center is available. Please update to continue
A download URL could not be found. Please try again later.
Please wait while Media Center player is installing
An error has occurred while attempting to install Media Center. Please try again later
The Updater has detected that a fresh install is necessary for your Media Center. A fresh install will ensure that your media center is completely up to date.
